pageTitle: AP1M2 Gene - GeneCards | AP1M2 Protein | AP1M2 Antibody
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {51199=This gene encodes a subunit of the heterotetrameric adaptor-related protein comlex 1 (AP-1), which belongs to the adaptor complexes medium subunits family. This protein is capable of interacting with tyrosine-based sorting signals. Alternative splicing results in multiple transcript variants. [provided by RefSeq, Jul 2014]}
textBeforeTable: COMPARTMENTS Subcellular locations from Q9Y6Q5-AP1M2_HUMAN Golgi apparatus. Cytoplasmic vesicle, clathrin-coated vesicle membrane; Peripheral membrane protein; Cytoplasmic side. Note=Component of the coat surrounding the cytoplasmic face of coated vesicles located at the Golgi complex.
